comment.author: 32348427@N06
comment._content:
To me, it's an interesting thing. When i first saw the photo, I thought--this is art. Upon further thought--I realized...it's only art because it captures the essence of the Urban street lifestyle. But in reality, if walking down that same street and seeing that imagery live---you'd not think to be "art", but more grotesque....and I'd not want to live in an poor environment....

All else said...--lovely work of art!

comment.author: 20375094@N00
comment._content: Union Street no longer exists as Southwest Washington was almost completely redeveloped in the 1950s and 1960s. A business of a similar trade name operates at 1550 1st Street SW as "Lucky TIme Liquors" and alternatively "Shulman Mart & Liquor."
